      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean addImage(int x, int y, java.lang.String name)
      Adds an image onto the canvas stored in the project folder (not src) given the image's name and the x and y coordinates of where to place the image
      static boolean addImageFromInternet(int x, int y, java.lang.String url)
      Adds an image from the internet onto the canvas given coordinates and a URL.

      This method adds text to the screen given just an x coordinate, y coordinate, and the text

      This method adds text to the screen given an x coordinate, y coordinate, font size, and the actual text

      This method adds text to the screen of a provided color with the x and y coordinates, and the size of the font as well as the text to be displayed

      This method adds text to the screen of a provided color with just the x and y coordinates as well as the text to be displayed

      This method adds text to the screen of a provided color with the x and y coordinates, the name and size of the font, as well as the text to be displayed

      • addImage

        public static boolean addImage(int x,
                               int y,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Adds an image onto the canvas stored in the project folder (not src) given the image's name and the x and y coordinates of where to place the image
        Parameters:
        x - The leftmost x coordinate of the image
        y - The y coordinate of the top left hand corner of the image
        name - The name of the image
        Returns:
        Returns true if the image was found and added, false if the image could not be located

      • addImageFromInternet

        public static boolean addImageFromInternet(int x,
                                           int y,
                                           java.lang.String url)
        Adds an image from the internet onto the canvas given coordinates and a URL.
        Parameters:
        x - The leftmost x coordinate of the image
        y - The y coordinate of the top left hand corner of the image
        url - The url of the image.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the image was found and added, false if the image could not be located

                                int point1Y,

                                int point2Y,
                                int point3X,
                                int point3Y)
        This method draws a triangle given the points of each vertex
        Parameters:
        point1X - The x coordinate of the first point
        point1Y - The y coordinate of the first point
        point2X - The x coordinate of the second point
        point2Y - The y coordinate of the second point
        point3X - The x coordinate of the third point
        point3Y - The y coordinate of the third point

      • drawTriangle

        public static void drawTriangle(int point1X,
                                int point1Y,
                                int point2X,
                                int point2Y,
                                int point3X,
                                int point3Y,
                                int thickness)
        This method draws a triangle given the points of each vertex with a given thickness
        Parameters:
        point1X - The x coordinate of the first point
        point1Y - The y coordinate of the first point
        point2X - The x coordinate of the second point
        point2Y - The y coordinate of the second point
        point3X - The x coordinate of the third point
        point3Y - The y coordinate of the third point
        thickness - The thickness of the line between each point.

                                int point2Y,
                                int point3X,
                                int point3Y,
                                java.lang.String color)

        Parameters:
        point1X - The x coordinate of the first point
        point1Y - The y coordinate of the first point
        point2X - The x coordinate of the second point
        point2Y - The y coordinate of the second point
        point3X - The x coordinate of the third point
        point3Y - The y coordinate of the third point
        color - The background color of the triangle as a string.

        x2 - The x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - The y coordinate of the second point

                            int y1,
                            int x2,
                            int y2,
                            java.lang.String color)
        Draws a line between the given points given a certain color
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x coordinate of the first point
        y1 - The y coordinate of the first point
        x2 - The x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - The y coordinate of the second point
        color - The color of the line to be drawn.

      • drawLine

        public static void drawLine(int x1,
                            int y1,
                            int x2,

                            java.lang.String color)

        Parameters:

        y1 - The y coordinate of the first point
        x2 - The x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - The y coordinate of the second point
        thickness - The thickness of the line to be drawn
